metadata.description: Full IELTS Listening Practice Test with 4 sections covering various topics and question types

sections.title: Hotel Room Booking for Event
sections.description: An enquiry about booking hotel rooms and facilities for an event
sections.instructions: Complete the notes for questions 1-7. Choose from the box for questions 8-10.

questions.question: number of people who can sit down to eat: ______
can go out and see the ______ in pots on the terrace
terrace has a view of a group of ______
has a ______
can give a ______ while people are eating
will provide ______ if there are any problems
in the hotel rooms or ______
outdoor swimming pool

context.instructions: What is said about using each of the following hotel facilities? Choose THREE answers from the box and write the correct letter, A, B or C.
leftColumn: A included in cost of hiring room

questions.question: gym

context.instructions: What is said about using each of the following hotel facilities? Choose THREE answers from the box and write the correct letter, A, B or C.
leftColumn: A included in cost of hiring room

questions.question: tennis courts

context.instructions: What is said about using each of the following hotel facilities? Choose THREE answers from the box and write the correct letter, A, B or C.
leftColumn: A included in cost of hiring room

sections.title: Tourist Excursions and Attractions
sections.description: Information about various excursions and attractions available to tourists
sections.instructions: Match information to excursions for questions 11-16. Choose TWO letters for questions 17-18 and 19-20.

questions.question: dolphin watching

context.instructions: What information does the speaker give about each of the following excursions? Choose SIX answers from the box and write the correct letter, A-H.

questions.question: forest walk

questions.question: horse riding

context.instructions: What information does the speaker give about each of the following excursions? Choose SIX answers from the box and write the correct letter, A-H.

questions.question: Which TWO things does the speaker say about the attraction called Musical Favourites?
options: A You pay extra for drinks
B You must book it in advance
C You get a reduction if you buy two tickets
D You can meet the performers
E You can take part in the show

questions.question: Which TWO things does the speaker say about the Castle Feast?
options: A Visitors can dance after the meal
B There is a choice of food
C Visitors wear historical costume
D Knives and forks are not used
E The entertainment includes horse races

sections.title: Children's Literature Module
sections.description: A discussion between students about a children's literature course
sections.instructions: Choose the correct letter A, B or C for questions 21-25. Match comments to stories for questions 26-30.

questions.question: What does Trevor find interesting about the purpose of children's literature?
options: the fact that authors may not realise what values they're teaching
the fact that literature can be entertaining and educational at the same time
the fact that adults expect children to imitate characters in literature

questions.question: Trevor says the module about the purpose of children's literature made him
options: analyse some of the stories that his niece reads
wonder how far popularity reflects good quality
decide to start writing some children's stories

questions.question: Stephanie is interested in the Pictures module because
options: she intends to become an illustrator
she can remember beautiful illustrations from her childhood
she believes illustrations are more important than words

questions.question: Trevor and Stephanie agree that comics
options: are inferior to books
have the potential for being useful
discourage children from using their imagination

questions.question: With regard to books aimed at only boys or only girls, Trevor was surprised
options: how long the distinction had gone unquestioned
how few books were aimed at both girls and boys
how many children enjoyed books intended for the opposite sex

questions.question: Perrault's fairy tales

context.instructions: What comment is made about each of these stories? Choose FIVE answers from the box and write the correct letter, A-G.
leftColumn: A translated into many other languages
C inspired a work in a different area of art
D more popular than the author's other works
E original title refers to another book
rightColumn: The Nutcracker and the Mouse King

sections.title: Underwater Archaeology
sections.description: A lecture about the hunt for sunken settlements and ancient shipwrecks
sections.instructions: Complete the notes below. Write ONE WORD ONLY for each answer.

questions.question: had a semicircle of large stones round a ______
research carried out into structures, ______ and human remains
used in the oil industry, e.g. to make ______
problems: they were expensive and ______
found ancient Roman ships carrying architectural elements made of ______
______ is used for short distance communication, acoustic waves for long distance
AUV can send data to another AUV that has better ______, for example
one carrying ______ supplies
tables may have been used for cleaning the ______
others carrying containers of olive oil or ______
